Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.GradientBuilder

  • Packages that use GradientBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.colors
    Contains the enumerations of HTML and GWT Material colors, to consume out-of-the-box, and utilities to create and manage own colors and classes to define gradients of patterns for charts.

    • Uses of GradientBuilder in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors that return GradientBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.addColorsStartStop​(String start, String stop)
      Sets the start and stop color of gradient, when the gradient will have only 2 colors.
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.addColorsStartStop​(IsColor start, IsColor stop)
      Sets the start and stop color of gradient, when the gradient will have only 2 colors.
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.addColorStop​(double offset, String color)
      Adds a stopping color with its offset
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.addColorStop​(double offset, IsColor color)
      Adds a stopping color with its offset
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.addColorStop​(GradientColor color)
      Adds a stopping color with its offset
      static GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.create()
      Creates a LINEAR gradient, with topDown orientation and chart scope.
      static GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.create​(GradientType type)
      Creates a gradient by a type, with chart scope.
      static GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.create​(GradientType type, GradientOrientation orientation)
      Creates a gradient by a type and an orientation, with chart scope.
      static GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.create​(GradientType type, GradientOrientation orientation, GradientScope scope)
      Creates a gradient by a type, an orientation and a scope.
      static GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.create​(GradientType type, GradientScope scope)
      Creates a gradient by a type and a scope.
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.setColors​(List<IsColor> colors)
      Sets the list of colors.
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.setColors​(IsColor... colors)
      Sets an array of colors to the gradient.
